thread.title: BRIEF-Topbuild To Acquire USI In All-Cash Transaction Valued At $475 Million

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Topbuild To Acquire USI In All-Cash Transaction Valued At $475 Million
text:
March 2 (Reuters) - Topbuild Corp:
* TOPBUILD TO ACQUIRE USI IN ALL-CASH TRANSACTION VALUED AT $475 MILLION
* TOPBUILD TO ACQUIRE USI IN ALL-CASH TRANSACTION VALUED AT $475 MILLION
* TOPBUILD CORP - ‍EXPECTED TO BE ACCRETIVE TO GAAP EPS IN 12-MONTH PERIOD AFTER CLOSE​
* TOPBUILD CORP - ‍ANTICIPATE $15M OF RUN-RATE COST SYNERGIES FROM DEAL​
* TOPBUILD CORP - PLANS TO FUND THIS TRANSACTION USING PROCEEDS FROM A $350 MILLION BOND ISSUANCE
* TOPBUILD CORP - ‍ EXPECTED TO ENHANCE PRO FORMA EBITDA MARGIN AND FREE CASH FLOW PROFILE​
* TOPBUILD - ALSO PLANS TO FUND DEAL USING PROCEEDS FROM $100 MILLION FROM A DELAYED DRAW TERM LOAN COMMITMENT
* TOPBUILD CORP - ‍ AGREEMENT TO ACQUIRE UNITED SUBCONTRACTORS HAS BEEN APPROVED BY TOPBUILD’S BOARD​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
